name: Black Dress
description: Every closet needs a simple black dress and this one is perfect for any occassion. Soft spun silk with flattering cuts for any occassion makes this a must have item.
care: For best results, dry clean only.

name: Blue Flowers
description: Playful flowers adorn this take on Boho Chic with a 100% cotton dress fit for any occassion.
care: For best results, dry clean only. Machine washable on cold. Do not tumble dry. Hang or lay flat to dry.

name: Casual Linen
description: Casual and comfortable linen makes this outfit one to live for. The loose fit and easy wear makes this a neccessary part of any wardrobe.
care: For best results, dry clean only. Machine washable on cold. Do not tumble dry. Hang or lay flat to dry.

name: Copper Sequin
description: Your night on the town will be unforgetable with this in your closet. This dress will catch the lights and the attention whether it's on the dance floor or at dinner.
care: For best results, dry clean only.

name: Gold Dress
description: Elegance and Haute Couture meet in this spectacular piece of wearable art. 100% breathable cotton is the base of this statement piece that will leave those around you breathless.
care: For best results, dry clean only. Machine washable on cold. Do not tumble dry. Hang to dry.

name: Lemon Yellow Dress
description: Take the sundress to the next level with this bright lemon yellow dress that looks just as spectacular on the beach as it does on the town.
care: For best results, dry clean only. Machine washable on cold. Do not tumble dry. Hang to dry.

name: Print Dress
description: This stylish print takes this simple dress from good to fantastic. 100% cotton is easy to wear and care for while still turning heads.
care: For best results, dry clean only. Machine washable on cold. Do not tumble dry. Lay flat to dry.

name: Silver Sequin
description: Silver sequins are classy, elegant, and exciting in this dress made for nights on the town
care: For best results, dry clean only.

name: Silver Dress
description: Silve lamme has never looked better in this amazing new addition to our lineup. Expertly crafted and guaranteed to fit to perfection.
care: For best results, dry clean only.

name: White Dress
description: Elegance meets otherworldly fashion in this fabulous white dress. Made of 100% cotton, this dress will never fail to impress.
care: For best results, dry clean only. Machine washable on cold. Do not tumble dry. Hang or lay flat to dry.
